name: AP_CLAIM_ADDL_ADJ
description: Clarity table that stores the Additional Adjustments for a service.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDL_ADJ_SRC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of positive adjustment that will be applied to the service's allowed amount.

columns.name: ADDL_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the monetary additional adjustment amount that applies to the allowed amount of a service.

columns.name: ADDL_ADJ_OVR_AMT
columns.description: Stores the override monetary amount for an additional adjustment that applies to the allowed amount of a service.
